alert.note: Alert for Duval; St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 1:54PM EDT until July 23 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern St. Johns County in northeastern Florida... Southeastern Duval County in northeastern Florida... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 154 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Unf, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Unf, Ponte Vedra Beach, Jacksonville Beach, Neptune Beach, Palm Valley, Sawgrass and San Pablo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
